changes.title: New Features
changes.text:
Important: Before installing version 7.0.0, you must uninstall any previous versions of the Unity Playworks Plugin via the Unity Package Manager.
[EN-4168] - Unity 6 support
[[EN-4245] - CSS filters support
[EN-4141] - Add Mesh Simplification Tool

changes.title: Fixes and Improvements
changes.text:
[EN-4044] - Load time improvement achieved by optimizing transform data locality
[EN-4142] - [Moloco] Fix failed upload
[EN-4153] - Fix light missing on the second scene
[EN-4154] - Fix Particle System issue with Texture Sheet Animation
[EN-4188] - Fix - Toony Colors Pro shaders export taking too long
[EN-4195] - [Moloco] Fix platform inlined tags
[EN-4199] - Fix - TextMeshPro not working without TMP Essential Resources
[EN-4202] - Update supported packages config
[EN-4203] - Fix - ScriptableObject not getting exported
[EN-4207] - Fix incorrect image culling
[EN-4210] - Fix - light and reflection probes compute issue
[EN-4213] - Remove quick build button from Unity bar
[EN-4216] - [Applovin] Change requirements for platform
[EN-4233] - Add terms to plugin and proper title
[EN-4234] - Fix Dynamic Batching breaking meshes
[EN-4235] - Fix shaders being missed on Android devices
